amendatorysection.catchline: Tax Commissioner; vacancy; removal by Governor.
amendatorysection.para: In case of vacancy in the office of Tax Commissioner by death, resignation, or otherwise, the Governor shall make a temporary appointment until the next session of the Legislature, when the vacancy for the unexpired term shall be filled in the manner provided in section 77-363. The Tax Commissioner may be removed by the Governor, following a public hearing, if requested by the Tax Commissioner.
